basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Jay, a an ambitious and dynamic junior full stack software developer with a strong passion for collaborative problem-solving. My primary goal is to make meaningful contributions to your team's objectives while also nurturing and expanding my skill set continuously. I'm committed to delivering high-quality code and innovative solutions that drive the success of our projects.

projects.title: Pressure Washing Website
projects.description: I'm so confident in my web development skills that I decided to help my friend out by making him a website for his friend out, it's one of the first tasks that I am solely responsible for. It's a big step and I hope I can make a great product!

projects.title: Big Brothers Big Sisters
projects.description: I was in charge of styling the Board of Directors page, updating some forms and adding functionality to the About Us page, it was a great experience and gave me good exposure.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: One of the first interactions with objects and constructor functions, it was a struggle to learn those two imperative concepts but I learned a lot along the way!
